name: POLYGON: Life
description:
POLYGON: Life is a video game in which you will have to earn a living doing work to pay your bills, but working is not everything, there is a lot to see in this world from here to the future.

WORKS:

Currently, the game has a mechanic job, but don't worry, there will be more jobs soon.

Upcoming jobs:
- Dependent.
- Doctor.
- Policeman.
- Office worker.
- Prison security personnel.
- Gangster.
- Firefighter.
Etc.

GRAPHIC ENGINE:

We have Unreal Engine 4 as a graphics engine, one of the best on the market and thanks to it this game is possible. FUTURE IMPLEMENTATIONS: - VEHICLE DRIVING
- HOUSING PURCHASE
- FURNITURE MODIFICATIONS
- ONLINE MODE
